desc: Some rusty lookin' rails, gettin' the itch to ride 'em.

desc: These metal panels feel mighty smooth.

desc: Just a buncha rocks.
name: Rough Stone

desc: Some sandy lookin' rocks.
name: Sandstone

desc: Gold! I can hardly contain my excitement!
name: Treasure Hoard

desc: These tough rocks are mighty sharp.
name: Blaststone Block

desc: Looks t'be some moonstone.

desc: Just a buncha rocks.
name: Rough Stone

desc: Some sorta hive made from crushed critters.
name: Hivestone

desc: Ain't nothin' gonna move this thick wall.

desc: It looks fresh cut, but this wood has been treated with somethin'.

desc: Reckon these bricks have been around a while.

desc: Some mighty soft lookin' sand.

name: Granite Block

desc: These strips're somethin' I should pay attention to.
name: Hazard Block

desc: Buncha fresh snow.

desc: Nice lookin' window with wooden panes.

desc: This ice is mighty slick.

desc: A layered roofing piece made outta straw.
name: Thatch

desc: This is a nice lookin' copper window frame.
name: Copper Window

desc: Ain't uncommon to run across cobblestone rocks like this.

desc: I can see clear through t'the other side of this glass.
name: Glass Block

desc: Wallpaper. Perfect for classin' up the place.
name: Classic Wallpaper

desc: I'd reckon these coconut bricks are mighty strong.

desc: A whole mess'a thick lookin' tar.

desc: I'd bet this here wood is mighty old.

desc: These space rocks ain't like the ones on the ground.

desc: Some chopped bamboo.

desc: It's made outta cactus. Better not lean against this.

desc: This here cloud is made from some heavy fluff stuff.
name: Cloud

desc: Bunch of bones. Who needs 'em!
name: Packed Bones

desc: Some mighty old lookin' bricks.

desc: Nothin' like a sturdy wooden fence.

desc: Shiny lookin' blocks made outta pure silver.

desc: This is some sorta flesh.
